# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security issue in NoteLine, please **do not create a public issue**.
Instead, report it directly to the maintainers so it can be handled safely.

### Contact

- Email: erbagdasaryan@gmail.com
- GitHub: Open a private issue if your GitHub account allows it, or email directly.

## Supported Versions

- We only provide security fixes for the latest stable release.

## Security Updates

- Security patches and advisories will be published in the repository once the issue is resolved.
- All users are encouraged to update to the latest version promptly.
